about_the_game:
She is a sex robot, who has been abandoned because humans are in the verge of being extinct, She wakes up one day when her power in her rooms comes back on, she must fight her way to Dr. Nicholas to fulfill her use again to have sex.

Sad Robot Lilly is a JRPG were you have to fight other robots and make your way to Dr. Nicholas

Maze like levels with secrets hidden around them for you to find.'


Different unique robots drop different pictures so make sure you farm them to unlock all the pictures



If you beat the robots that have a chance to drop a chip that you can use to unlock pictures
There is also hidden pictures throughout the game for you to find



There is 13 Chips to find to unlock pictures that are dropped from enemies or bought

There are 6 skills you can learn by leveling up



Once you beat the main story there is a battle arena to unlock more pictures.

All characters are over 18

content_descriptors.notes:
The developers describe the content like this:


This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, and General Mature Content.

* Nudity or sexual content
* Not suitable for watching at work
* Not suitable for all ages
* All characters in the game are over 18 years old
Note: All Characters 18+ Years Old.

name: Sad Robot Lilly

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Up
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
